CustomField.formula:
IF ( OR(
Name = "Oxford Barrett St. P2", Name = "Oxford Barrett St. P1"), "Class 2",
IF(AND( Total_System_Size_kW_AC__c > 60, Total_System_Size_kW_AC__c <= 1000), "Class 2",
IF ( Total_System_Size_kW_AC__c > 1000, "Class 3", null)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: MA Specific Based on size of project (1MW), if the SSS falls into Class II or Class III categories
CustomField.label: System Class
